California Road Trip: 5 scenic routes for an unforgettable summer

Road tripping has exploded in California since the onset of the coronavirus pandemic two years ago. With some travelers hitting pause on their bucket-list vacation plans, more people are opting to load up the car and explore their home states instead. Luckily, California is top-to-bottom lousy with natural beauty, historic towns, scenic back roads and first-rate national parks.
